contest-event.event-date:
May 2, 1976 D Buxton Festival (Section A)
Buxton Festival (Section A) 101 Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-section-a
Suite Gothique
Octagon Theatre, Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Best soloist - solo cornet Rothwell Temp. Prizes - 1st £60 and trophy, 2nd £40 and cup, 3rd £25. 9 bands competed. 13th annual contest.
